betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§r This first questline will guide from the spawn to §7§lIron§r age.
You will learn how to make your first furnace & iron tools from Thaumcraft mechanics.

It's very advised, if you already know the basics of Thaumcraft, to follow this guide till the Thaumometer Quest is complete.
Doing the opposite can lock up your game and give an harder time to progress (don't do aspects combinaison before told to do so or other researchs than the ones told to).

Have a nice game !

After making your stone tools, you need to get some §7§l§riron ores ; they will make an introduction into thaumaturgy with the basics.

Once you got your clusters and some flints, clay balls and coal, you can make your first §l§7Iron nuggets§r.

Now that you got some nuggets, you can now make your first wand !

It's not the greatest (made out of mundane wood and iron), but it allows you to start collecting vis by draining nodes or killing mobs.

You can have a look at the vis storage by sneaking with it in your hand, or looking at it in your inventory.

To write an remember all your researchs on magic, you will need a special book called a Thaumonomicon.

Acquiring it is a bit tricky : you will need to right-click a §l§6Bookshelf§r with your wand (no vis required).

This book is the central point of the modpack ; all the researchs have to be done through it.

Using a wand on a block structure to turn it into something else is called "Mystical Construct" ; more can be learn in the Thaumonomicon as always.

If you want to use your wand to make some more complex crafts, you will a special worktable that allows to focus vis into recipes.

The Arcane Worktable can be built by right-clicking a Table with your wand (no vis required).

To acquire and learn new knowledge, you will need a Research Table.

This one can be built by putting 2 Tables next to each other, and by right-clicking them with the §7§lScribing Tools§r.

Noww you need to make a Glass Phial (which is a component of the Research Table craft), but we don't have any furnace to make glass on hand !

There are a few ways :
 - You can craft §l§7§ra §l§7§lGlass Phial§r without glass in the Arcane Worktable (have a look at your Thaumonomicon).
 - Some furnaces can be found in Villages, to make glass and vanilla glass bottles.
 - Champions will drop some loot bags with some potions that you can drink, giving you an empty bottle.
 - Witchs can also drop you an empty bottle, if you're brave enough to fight it !

For making you first research, you'll first need some paper, some ink to fill your inkwel if it goes empty ; and a Scribing Tool to write.
You can use the Scribing Tool from your research table, or make another one to keep on you, it's your choice.

To get the research paper, open your Thaumonomicon and click on the research you want to make.
It will use a paper and remove some durability on your inkwell, and you'll get a Research Note.

The first research you want to learn, is how to make a Stone §l§rFurnace (I'm sure you'll find it useful)
It can be found in the Artifice group, at the top of the page.

The next quest will guide you on how to complete researchs (more information can be read on your Thaumonomicon as well)

Now that you got the research note linked to the research you want, you need to put it in your Research Table, in the free slot next to your Scribing Tools.
The full research draw will pop on the right.

To complete the research, you must link all initial aspects together ; to link an aspect to another you need to put an aspect that is §ncomposed of or compound§r of the aspect next to it.
For the moment, you only know the 6 primal aspects : §l§l§r§l§e§lAer§r -§r §c§lIgnis§r§r - §l§9§lAqua§r - §a§lTerra§r - §8§lPerditio§r - §lOrdo§r .

They are many more aspects of superior tiers to discover. To try a combinaison of aspects, you have to click on the first one, then on the second one.
This will place them virtually in the bottom left two slots, so you can press the purple button to try to combine them.

§e§l WARNING :§r§m§r§o Not all combinaisons will work and fails will result on a loss of Aspects. Be sure to follow the guide if you aren't sure where to go with aspects & researchs.

§rFor this first research, we will help you going through it : you have this 3 starting aspects : §a§lTerr§r§aa§r,§§ §c§lIgnis§r and §8§lPerditio§r.
All three do have an existing combinaison with Ordo ; so you can place one Ordo at the middle of the grid.
To place an aspect on the grid, you have to keep leftclick on an aspect, then move your cursor on the slot you want on the grid ; then release.

Now, considering that you can only link aspects with parents or childrens of them, you have to discover the three combinaisons we talk earlier.
They will result as :
 - §b§lVitreous§r, for §lOrdo§r and §a§lTerra§r
 - §b§0§r§b§lPotentia§r§r, for§l Ordo§r and §c§lIgnis§r
 - §2§lPermutatio§l§r, for §lOrdo§r and §l§8§lPerditio§r
You can place these new 3 aspects of tier 1 (primal are considered tier 0), where they need to go to link to their "children" aspects.
And so, you should have a finished research ! Take the result in your hand and right click it to learn it ; you can now read the research and craft it's components.

More can be learn about Research in already unlocked researchs in your Thaumonomicon.

Press the checkbox when your research is done, as we will ask you to craft it's component on the next quest !

Finally you can make a Furnace !
Like the glass phial (if you didn't take the shortcut), this is an arcane craft and will require some vis in your Wand.

For memo, you can fill your Wand by killing mobs and having it in you main inventory bar, or by harvesting Aura Nodes (they are rare and not quite visible with the human eye yet).

Little warning before disaster, the Stone Furnace needs at least an Iron Pickaxe to be harvested.
Be sure to complete the quest before putting in your world !

Once you smelted some Iron bars, you can now start the research on the Iron Tools !
This one is located next to the Stone Furnace in Artifice section of the Thaumonomicon, and has been unlocked by researching the previous one.

You'll have to solve it on your own for this one ; the aspect marked "?" is an aspect that you didn't discover yet.
We'll give it to you : it's §7§lMetallum§r, a tier 2 aspect combined from §b§lVitreus§r and §a§lTerra§r.

For completing this research, you will need to craft with your wand :
 - An Iron Pickaxe, used for mining the few Gold ore you need for the next step
 - An Iron Axe, that can harvest the two magical trees, Greatwood and Silverwood.

Warning also, the Iron tools aren't super durable (only 15 durability), they're only used for transition to better materials.

For the last quest of the starting questline, we will ask you to make a §e§lThaumometer§r out of Gold, Shards and Glass.
This device allows for scanning items, blocks, entities, yourself and other players to gain new research aspects ; every thing is only scannable once !

To scan something, you must have discovered all the "child" aspects of the aspects contained within.
For exemple : you can scan Snow, as it contains §b§lGelum§r, combined from §c§lIgnis§r and §7§lPerditio§r. Or you can combine them in the research table ; two paths to choose.
You already know §b§lPotentia§r, §b§lVitreus§r, §2§lPermutatio§r and §lMetallum§r from your previous researchs.

Here's a walkthrough / optimized path to get to tier 6 aspects and be able to scan everything without losing too much aspects :

§
§c§lVictus§r (tier 1)
- Combine §a§lTerra§r + §b§lAqua§r
§l§a§lHerba§r (tier 2)
- Scan a Grass block, or combine §c§lVictus§r + §a§lTerra§
§r
§4§

§
§r§7§lMortuus§r (tier 2)
- Combine §c§lVictus §r+ §r§r§7§lPerditio§r
§r
§l§r§lMotus§r (tier 1)
- Scan a §nTrapdoor§r, or combine §l§e§lAer §r+ §lOrdo
§
§0§1§2§3§4§3§4§5§6§7§8§9§a§a§b§c§d§e§f§4§l§lBestia§r (tier 2)
- Scan a §nSquid§r, or combine §lMotus§r + §4§l§c§lVictus§r
§d§

§7§lSpiritus§r (tier 3) and §7§lVinculum§r (tier 2)
- Scan § §nSoul Sand§r, or combine §7§lMortuus§r + §c§lVictus§r
- Combine §lMotus§r + §7§lPerditio§r (for the second, or scan §nAmber§r)
§6§lCognitio§r (tier 4)
- Scan §l§r§nPaper§r, or combine §7§lSpiritus§r + §c§lIgnis§r
§b§lSensus§r (tier 4)
- Scan §nFlowers§r / §nInks§r, or combine §7§lSpiritus§r + §e§lAer§r
§lHumanus§r (tier 5)
- Scan §nRotten Flesh§r, or combine §6§lCognitio§r + §4§lBestia§r
§9§lInstrumentum§r (tier 6)
- Scan §nFlint§r / §nTable§r, or combine §lHumanus§r + §lOrdo§r

There you go, you can scan almost anything ! If you are missing some aspects, try discovering them on your own or google it to find the last ones !
You are free to continue researchs on your own or continue to the next questline to get to mid-game.

Let's introduce you to alchemy / cauldron crafting !
To obtain a §7§lCrucible§r, you'll need to use you wand on a mundane cauldron.
It works like it's conterpart needing water for operations ; but it will also need some strong heat source beneath it to make the water boiling.
Some §c§lLava§r will do the work for now, beware to not burn everything around it !
You can see that the water is boiling by looking at the bubbles poping at the water's surface.

As always for all the quests, you can find some more information in your Thaumonomicon, by reading your completed researchs.

For your first craft with the cauldron, you're going to need to research the Nitor (in the alchemy tab, aright to the center).
Once your research is done, you can have a look at the recipe :
It asks to throw a Glowstone in a Crucible with 5 §c§lIgnis§r, 8 §e§lLux§r and 5 §9§l§b§lPotentia§r.

Some time before, you were ask to make a §rThaumometer to scan items and blocks ;
So you can see that, for exemple, a Grass block contains 1 §a§a§lTerra§r and 1§a§l Herba§r, if you throw 1 Grass in a hot Crucible it will consume the item and transfer it's aspects to the Crucible.
So if you throw 5 Grass blocks, the Cauldron will contain 5 Terra and Terra.

We'll help you for this first one : you can find the needed aspects in §l§nCoal§r and §l§nTorches§r.§r
You just have to drop the right amount of them in the Crucible, and then drop 1 Glowstone Powder (the item shown on the crucible recipe) when all the needed aspects are present in the Crucible.

Now you just made a Nitor ! It's a magical light source than can be placed in the world.
It also emits some formidable heat, enough to heat a Crucible to make the water boils : safer than Lava !

An Alumentum is an unstable material that can burn twice the items that coal can in a Furnace.
It can also be thrown on blocks with right click to trigger a small explosion.

§l§7§lPerditio§r can be found easily in Cobblestone, Sand or Gunpowder

The research can be found below the Nitor's one.

Thaumium is one of the most useful materials in Thaumcraft ; you can make decent armor and tools with it : the pickaxe got 400 durability to get rid of the scrappy Iron pick.
The Thaumium tools also got the mining level of the Diamond pick ; that means it can harvest Obsidian and Glowstone easily.

For making the tools, you would also need the Greatwood Wand Core research in the wandcraft tab ; you can't use mundane wood sticks to craft them.
The Crucible recipe needs §d§d§d§l§l§l§5§5§5§l§l§lPraecantatio§r§r§r. This aspect can be hard to find : 
It can be found in big amounts in Greatwood/Silverwood logs (will need at least an iron axe).
You will discover later some other resources that got this aspect ; be sure to scan everything new you discover !

The research can be found below at the center-bottom of the Alchemy tab.
If it's not visible yet, try scanning more things in the world.

The next step will focus on Essentia : this mechanic allows for extracting aspects from items and putting it in a liquid form.

You will need to research §l§7§lEssentia Distillation§r§r§r, then to craft the Alchemical Furnace and between 1-5 Alembics.

To make the furnace working, put the furnace down and a pile of maximum 5 alembics on top of it.
In the furnace's interface, the top slot is for items to "burn", and the bottom one for burnables.
The progress bar is at the right, and the internal storage of Essentia is at the left ; if it's internal buffer is full you won't be able to burn new items down.

The essentia will then be extracted to the different alembics at the top :
Each alembic can store a maximum of 32 of one unique essentia aspect, that means you can only extract a maximum of 5 different unique aspects at the same time from the furnace.

Finally, the essentia can be extracted from the alembics by using pipe network linked to Warded jars ; but the easiest and quickest way is to right click the alembics will a Jar or a Phial in your hand.

Let's show your skill ! For this quest you will make a jar filled with 64 §l§a§lTerra§r, and a Phial of §l§7§lPerditio§r.

The Goggles of Revealing can be used for seeing that aspect is present in the Alembics.
You can empty an alembic by sneak right-clicking it with an empty hand ; the same also works for Jars !

Did you always want to see what aspects are currently present in your cauldron when failing a recipe ? Or seeing what aspects there's in a node while tapping it ?

Your wishes are exhausted ! The research for these Goggles can be found in the Artifice Tab, next to the Thaumometer.

This mundane wood and iron wand is starting to be all rusty ... An that vis penality of 10% is really annoying !

Doing some researchs in the Thaumaturgy tab, you discovered some new wand cores and caps to make a better wand for the time being !

A wand made of §n§l§4§lGreatwood§r and capped with §l§e§lGold§r is cheap, have no penalty of vis cost and a good vis storage of 50, double the one from your old wand.

Caps adds only for vis cost reduction, and Wand cores for vis storage & wand passive abilities.

Being tired of using these scrappy iron tools that break super quickly ? Thaumium tools cost a bit more but they have 400 durabilty !

You will need Greatwood Wand Cores to make the tool rod, and of course a good amount of Thaumium.

Now that you got a durable axe, you can make your hands on huge quantities of §5§lPraecantatio§r for making even more Thaumium if needed !
The full armor and sword are also decent till you reach mid-game.
Be aware that diamond tools break on the first hit, some equivalent tools will be discovered later with the same durability as diamond.

There you are, reaching the most important crafting mechanic of Thaumcraft : Infusion.

You will need to craft all components first, as indicated on this quest, and some more pedestals (a multiple of 4).
Read carefully the research and put together blocs as shown on the Mystical Construct. Once it's done, check your wand has enough vis and right click the Matrix bloc with it, and tada !
The 4 pillars should form, and the Matrix bloc will start turning on itself and moving.

Depending on your needs, you will need a certain number of pedestals around your Matrix ; you always should put them following a symmetry (that's why we asked to get a multiple of 4).
Any non-symmetric placement of pedestals and/or stabilizers (candles, mob heads ...) will result in more instability.
Matrix instability will cause odd things to occur while doing an Infusion recipe : items jumping of pedestals or disappearing, asking for more Essentia, or worse ...)

To realize an Infusion, first research anything that will use it, like the Enhanced Thaumium Tools at the left of the Infusion one.
- The item at the center will be placed under the Matrix bloc on the pedestal.
- Items circling around it need to be put on the pedestals around (placing them is the most symmetrical way possible helps with instability)
- Aspects are needed in the form of Essentia stored in recipients (their placement doesn't influence instability)
- And the fourth parameter : Instability. Each recipe got it's own instability factor.
They are : Negligeable, Minor, Moderate, High, Very High and Dangerous.
The current stability value of your matrix can be known using some special device. Try scanning your moving block of Matrix, maybe you'll discover something !

A good §n§l§r§lVis Cost Reduction§r keeps all Thaumaturge happy !

When you put your cursor on your wand in your inventory, next to the maximum vis storage you can find a value written like "§7§l§c§l§r§l (avg vis cost 100 %)§r "
The % value tells you how much vis will cost any craft based on it's original recipe.
Iron caps give 110% vis cost, and Gold caps give 100% ; you'll discover some better caps later with researchs.

Other items like armor and wearables can give Vis cost reduction ; you already got one ! Have a look at your Revealing Goggles.
If you got a Wooden wand (110% cost) and Goggles (5% reduction) put on : the vis cost will be §n110-5 = §l105%§n§r avg vis cost.

In the Artfice tab you can find a research about §b§lEnchanted Fabric§r, not too far from the Thaumometer research.
This research give access to a new magic item, used to make some Vis cost reduction armor (more like a robe = almost no defense).

When wore fully, this armor set gives 5% vis cost reduction + 5% from the goggles results in 10% with the 4 slots occupied !

You finally built your matrix and reached mid-game ! 
To be sure you actually built it, we'll ask for you to research and make one of the 5 Enhanced Thaumium Tools of your choice.

Having a little bit more Essentia than asked and replacement side-items is good practice, in case your recipe becomes unstable and something bad happens.

 §lGood luck and welcome to mid-game Thaumaturge !

In this pack, most of Vanilla tools and armor have edited durability. In instance :

- §lIron§r Tools have 15 Durability.
- §e§lGold§r and §b§lDiamond§r Tools have 1 Durability.
- §l§4§lBow§r, §lIron§r§§, §e§lGold§r and §b§lDiamond§r Armor have 10 Durability.

To get around this, you must reach §d§5§lThaumium§r Tools that got 400 durability.
Other stronger tools and materials will be discovered further is your playthrough !

In this pack, accessing Enchanting is much harder than usual and has been pushed further into mid-game.

- At early-game, the most you can do is combine looted Enchanted Books and Tools in an §7§l§8§l§7§lAnvil§r.
- Once reaching mid-game and doing a bit of research, §7§lMatrix Infusion Enchantment§r can be used as usual.
- In late mid-game, the vanilla §7§l§c§lEnchanting Table§r can be researched once the player is warped enough.
- Finally at late-game, the §c§lOsmotic Enchanter§r is accessible.

Nether has been changed drastically in terms of Mob AI and Ore Generation. Down here can be found :

- Nether Ores that got x2 output,
- Nether Shard Ores with it's own research tab and decent output,

But be aware, this dimension is now pretty dangerous and trying to harvest it's ore wealth will awaken all tha rage contained in this dimension ...
 You know the risks !

''When beginning your research, you shouldn't start as your usual Thaumcraft playthrough, as you won't access your Thaumometer before doing some crucial researchs.
The imposed path by the expert mode, is :

- Do not make combinaisons unless asked in the questline, or if you know what you're doing.
- Research §n§nStone Furnace§r§r then §n§nIron Tools§r§r.
- Once reaching Thaumometer, you can make your aspects as usual.
- Research §n§nNitor§r§r, §n§nAlumentum§r§r and §n§nThaumium§r§r as usual, then you can go for Alchemical Furnace and Infusion.

This note is mostly dedicated for experienced players, so they don't go and run out of aspects at the start of their playthrough.
The questlines explain how to reach mid-game (Matrix Infusion) through the expert changes.

In this pack, there's two ways to see all the items scanned that contains a specific Aspect :
 §n§r§n§r§o§7§o(This note mostly concerns players that have crafted §e§l§oThaumometer§r§7)§r

- In your Thaumonomicon, in the research "§nAspects of Magic§r" at the center of§o§r§n Basic Information§r tab.
You'll find a list of all the aspects you discovered yet ; and if you put your cursor on the aspect of your choice, it will show a list of all items scanned that contains this aspect, and how much they got.

- When typing "§n@NEI§r" in your inventory's searchbar, you will get the list of all aspects. ("?" means an aspect not yet discovered)
If you right-click or press U on the aspect of your choice, a first tab will open. If you navigate with the top arrows you will found the same list as the first options, but much well organized AND with shown names of items and all NEI functions.

Keeping memory of all the Aura Nodes you encountered on your journey can be a mess.
§7§o(This note is mostly dedicated to player that crafted §e§l§oRevealing Goggles§7)§r

Once you scanned an Aura Node, it can be found back easily if you are wearing any kind of Revealing Goggles :
If you press "I", a menu will open with a list of all the nodes you scanned from now : you can select a node with "Mark", this will pop an arrow atop of your screen.
To remove it, just return in the menu and press "Clear Arrow" at the top.

Be aware that if you delete a node from this menu, you can't bring it back as you can't scan twice the same node/item.

For this modpack, the AI of most mobs is much more developed and mobs now have brand new brain cells and abilities.

Handle with care your new encounters and be aware that for a long time of your playthrough, mobs will be hunting you and not the other way around !
This quest allows to load the§n§r §nNew Questlines§r (if there are some), coming after a modpack's update.

If you encounter some bugs or issues in your playthrough, you can report them via :

- CurseForge Comments
- GitHub issues tracker
- Discord server

The best way for issues would be on GitHub, as it will keep an archive of everything that happened before.

I'm also very hyped to hear your feedback on the pack, you can talk with the Dev' team on the Discord server ! :-)

This modpack got §nCustom Harvest Level§r on most utility blocks : this means they will need a §nspecific Tool§r with a §nspecific Mining Level§r.
For exemple, a Chest will only drop when harvested with - at least, a Stone Axe.

The WAILA UI at the top of your screen is updated to show these informations ; when you look at the block while sneaking, it will say 2 important things :

- If the block is §nCurrently Harvestable§r : The checkmark will go green if you got the §ncorrect §nTool AND Mining level§r.
- The tool needed to harvest the block : It only tells the Tool type needed, and not the Mining Level.

Some other natural blocs like Diamond Ore, Greatwood Logs, Glowstone got their own mining level adjusted to the expert progress path.
The full list can be found in the GitHub under path §o§r"§7§e§6§6info§r/§7§6harvest-levels.txt§r".

If you really love the pack and can afford to give us a little something, there's two main ways to support the development :

- Donate through GitHub / CurseForge / Discord link (all links go to GitHub Sponsors).
- Use the discount for Bisect server hosting, via the blue banner on the modpack's curseforge page.
No Description

You step into a new world, but you'll soon discover that the rules aren't the same down here.
Be quick while the sun is still high, the night won't be forgiving !
Now that you learnt research and wandcrafting, the next step will be Cauldron crafting and Essentia manipulation right in the path of midgame.
General informations about the pack before starting !
